question: اللَّهُ
answer: Allah will pay them in full

question: وَلَيُبَدِّلَنَّهُمْ
answer: and surely He will change for them

question: لَيَسْتَخْلِفَنَّهُمْ
answer: surely He will grant them succession

question: كِبْرَهُ
answer: took upon himself a greater share of it

question: وَلَيُمَكِّنَنَّ
answer: and that He will surely establish

question: يُوَفِّيهِمُ
answer: Allah will pay them in full

question: فَوَفَّاهُ
answer: He will pay him in full

question: تَوَلَّىٰ
answer: took upon himself a greater share of it
